tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SEM_keyword_search_queries (
  keyword_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  keyword VARCHAR(255),
  search_query TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE keywords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    keyword VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    match_type VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    budget DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE keyword_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY, keyword VARCHAR(255), campaign_id INT);
CREATE TABLE search_query_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY, search_query VARCHAR(255), campaign_id INT);
CREATE TABLE campaign_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_name VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE, end_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE campaign_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    budget DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE
);
